Description: Postcard; printed; photograph showing the temple and pylon at Karnak.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used; postmarked Aswan, 26th March 1908, 8.00 am; the partially illegible message reads: "Dear Mrs Harford, I saw the temple by moonlight ... to see by day ...We stayed at Luxor for 3 days & now at Esna 490 miles from Cairo, returns to Cairo X from Aswan. at Cairo Mrch [March] 4th 1908, staying a few days then off again. Mrs ... not very well. hope yours are all well fondest love AW".
